hero.title: You Are a Genius
hero.subtitle: unlock your potential - through AI and psychology

features.title: An investment in your future is priceless
features.subtitle: Get the tools you need to succeed in a rapidly evolving world
features.new_way_title: A whole new way to learn
features.neuro_desc: Every game, story, and challenge is built upon proven neuropsychological principles that target specific cognitive skills. Our platform adapts to your unique learning style, ensuring optimal brain development.
features.tailored_desc: Our adaptive AI creates personalized learning paths that evolve with your progress. Each experience is carefully crafted to match your cognitive profile and learning pace.
features.montessori_desc: Inspired by Montessori principles, our platform encourages self-directed learning and discovery. Learners explore concepts at their own pace, building confidence and independence.

videos.title: Discover Neuraplay
videos.subtitle: Embark on a journey where neuroscience meets play. Every game is a step toward unlocking your limitless potential.
videos.welcome_desc: Step into a world where learning becomes an adventure. Discover how our neuroscience-based approach transforms education.
videos.experience_desc: Witness the magic of personalized learning in action. See how our platform adapts to each learner's unique cognitive profile.

releases.title: New Releases
releases.subtitle: Discover our latest games and features designed to enhance cognitive development
releases.cube_desc: Advanced 3D Rubik's Cube with real-time cognitive tracking. Targets 22 neuropsychological concepts.
releases.ai_desc: Upgraded AI assistant with voice capabilities, multi-language support, and personalized learning recommendations.
releases.analytics_desc: Comprehensive cognitive development tracking with detailed progress reports and performance analytics.

cta.title: Ready to unlock your potential?
cta.subtitle: Join thousands of learners who trust Neuraplay for their cognitive development
cta.active_users: Join a growing family with more than ever active users!

coming_soon.title: Coming Soon
coming_soon.subtitle: Exciting new features and experiences on the horizon

hero.title: Your Learning Journey Starts Here
hero.subtitle: An AI-powered platform that adapts to your unique learning style, building confidence and cognitive skills through personalized, neuroscience-based education.

growth.title: Measurable Growth
growth.description: of learners show cognitive development progress

science.title: The Science Behind Our Approach
science.subtitle: Every feature is built on proven neuropsychological principles

courses.title: Personalized Courses
courses.description: AI-generated courses that adapt to your learning pace and style
courses.benefit2: Covers all subjects: STEM, languages, and more

memory.title: Long-Term Memory System
memory.description: Our AI remembers everything you learn, creating a personalized knowledge base
memory.benefit1: Never forgets what you have learned
memory.benefit4: Adapts teaching based on memory patterns

tutor.title: Your Personal AI Tutor
tutor.subtitle: A tutor that truly understands and adapts

remembers.title: Remembers Everything
remembers.description: Our AI tutor remembers every conversation, every lesson, and every achievement. It builds a complete picture of your learning journey.

patient.title: Infinitely Patient
patient.description: No judgment, no frustration. You can ask questions as many times as needed, at your own pace, without any pressure.

celebrates.title: Celebrates Every Win
celebrates.description: Every small achievement is recognized and celebrated, building confidence and motivation for continued learning.

adapts.title: Adapts in Real-Time
adapts.description: The tutor adjusts its teaching style instantly based on how you respond, ensuring optimal learning at every moment.

tutor.quote: "Every learner is different. Our AI tutor adapts to you, not the other way around."

safety.title: Safety & Security
safety.subtitle: Your safety is our top priority

encryption.title: End-to-End Encryption
encryption.description: All data is encrypted and secure. Your information is protected with industry-leading security measures.

content.title: Content Moderation
content.description: AI-powered content filtering ensures all educational content is appropriate and safe.

privacy.title: Privacy First
privacy.description: We never share your data with third parties. Privacy is built into every aspect of our platform.

control.title: User Controls
control.description: You have full control over your learning experience, with comprehensive settings and tools.
